title: Sticky Mackerel
ingredients: ['4 x 500–600-g mackerel, cleaned and gutted', 'olive oil, for frying', 'For the sticky sauce', '50ml ketchup', '25g brown sugar', '1⁄4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1⁄2 teaspoon smoked paprika', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '1⁄2 teaspoon allspice', '1⁄2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1⁄2 teaspoon mace', '1⁄2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
